plot: An excellent film, showing the finish of the great Derby race of June, 1901, which was won by Mr. W. C. Whitney's "Volodyovski," in the record time of 2:40 4/5.
title: English Derby, 1901
plot_es: An excellent film, showing the finish of the great Derby race of June, 1901, which was won by Mr. W. C. Whitney's "Volodyovski," in the record time of 2:40 4/5.
